keyPolicies.policyDescription: Successfully lobbied for extra police with 365 more working across Essex, including officers tackling rural crime and patrolling town centers, keeping residents and businesses safe.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: A Health Service We Can Be Proud Of
keyPolicies.policyDescription: £394 million more a week for the NHS delivered by the Conservatives. Local hospitals have 1502 more doctors and nurses than in 2010. Princess Alexandra will share in £2.7 billion worth of funding as one of the first six hospitals to be rebuilt.

Worked with local teachers as an MP and minister, delivering a funding increase for all primary and secondary school pupils. Increased funding for more investment in skills funding for 16-19 year olds.
